title: Strengthening App Development Practical Skills: SODAR Model-Based Agricultural Education Teacher Preparedness Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Agricultural Education Theory and Experience in ICT-Enhanced Instruction
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Apply the five stages of the SODAR model (Survey-Observe-Decide-Act-Review) to agricultural education activity design
Systematically conduct field observations in agricultural education settings using digital tools
Design an educational activity evaluation system based on the SODAR model
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
